derivation: or מִשְׁלֹחַ; also מִשְׁלָח; from H7971 (שָׁלַח);
outline:
1. outstretching, sending, sending forth
  2. outstretching, undertaking (that to which one stretches out the hand), place of letting or turning loose, pasture (place where animals are let free)
kjv_def: to lay, to put, sending (forth), to set.
strongs_def: a sending out, i.e. (abstractly) presentation (favorable), or seizure (unfavorable); also (concretely) a place of dismissal, or a business to be discharged
